name: Introduction to Earth Science
description: An introduction to the Earth sciences, including geology, meteorology, oceanography, and astronomy.

name: Chemistry
description: A survey of the basic principles of chemistry, including atomic structure, chemical reactions, and the study of matter.

name: Geology
description: The study of the Earth's physical structure, processes, history, and resources.

name: Meteorology
description: The study of the atmosphere and weather.

name: Oceanography
description: The study of the oceans and their associated phenomena.

name: Astronomy
description: The study of the universe and its components.
